title: Dexter the Dragon & Bumble the Bear
original_title: Als Je Begrijpt Wat Ik Bedoel
overview: Bumble the Bear (Olivier Bommel) finds an egg that, it turns out, has a cute little dragon in it. However, this dinosaur grows huge every time it is upset. As this causes a lot of problems, Ollie Bommel has to face a difficult dilemma.
